original:
Silicon Valley executives and venture capitalists are mobilizing to fight against a California ballot measure that could threaten American capitalism.
Proposition 21, which will be voted on in November, seeks to expand rent control in California by repealing the Costa-Hawkins Rental Housing Act. The act limits rent control to buildings built before 1995, exempts single-family homes and condos, and
sampled:
Silicon Community executives and venture moneylenders are mobilizing to fight against a California ballot measure that could threaten American capitalism.
Proposition 21, which will be voted on in November, seeks to expand rent control in California by repealing the Costa-Hawkins Rental Housing Act. The act limits rent control to buildings built before 1995, exempts single-family homes and condos, and
